name: Pirates Attack
description:
The concept of this pirate's creation for Kenney Jam is growth. Unfortunately, we must abandon this game before the submission deadline. however, we decided to submit this game to itch.io in order to receive some feedback from other users in exchange for the time we put in.

Credits
  • Soheilk47 - Programmer
  • Parven - Designer
  1. Assets - Kenney • Free game assets
  2. Music - https://soundimage.org/looping-music
  3. Sound Effects - Freesound - Freesound
